text: Allah ta’ala ne tum se apna waada saccha kar dikhaaya, jab ke tum us ke hukm se unhe kaat rahe thein yahaa tak ke jab tum ne pasth-himmati eqtiyaar ki aur kaam mein jhagadne lage aur nafarmaani ki, us ke baadh ke us ne tumhaari chaahath ki cheez tumhe dikhaadi, tum mein se baaz dunya chaahte thein aur baaz ka iraada aaqirath ka tha, to phir us ne tumhe un se pher diya, ta ke tum ko azmaaye aur yaqinan us ne tumhaari laghzish29 se darguzar farma liya aur imaan waalo par Allah ta’ala bade fazl waala hai
